summary: After the death of her father, a woman is forced to take over as empress and fight to save her kingdom.
cast: Kelly Chen|Donnie Yen|Leon Lai|Xiaodong Guo|Zhenhai Kou|Weihua Liu|Shan Zhang|Zhi-Hui Chen|Jie Yan|Bo Zhou|Bing Bo|Guoyi Chen|Kang Chen|Liang Chen|Limin Deng|Hongqing Guo|Tian Hao|Daichi Harashima|Wei Huang|Xin Liang Jiang|Yiyi Jiang|Shengyu Jin|Bingyuan Li|Yuan Li|Jianming Lin|Asoka Liu|Xinyi Liu|Xu Yang Liu|Zhiwei Liu|Yuan Jia Pan|Bo Peng|Qiu Sheng Peng|Zhi Peng|Da Liang Qiao|Guo Chao Sun|Xiaofei Sun|Zhen Tan|Dong Dong Wang|Jackie Wang|Lu Wang|Yachao Wang|Ying Ji Wang|Yongsheng Wang|Yi Fan Xiao|Zhiyong Xie|Wang Xin|Hung Zhi Yan|Yi-Yi Yang|Guoxiong Yin|Hailong Yin|Fu Xian Zhang|Hai Jiang Zhang|Jie Zhang|Jin Zhang|Jun Zhang|Weidong Zhang|Xiaoming Zhang|You Zhang|Qiu Sheng Zhao|Zhonghe Zhou|Forest Zhu|Xueliang Zhu
director: Director: Siu-Tung Ching (as Tony Ching Siu Tung)
title: Jiang shan mei ren
